channel.title: Education on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Education on NewsStreet

item.title: Indian students in US jumps by 19% in 2021-22, says US govt data
item.description: Indian students in US jumps by 19% in 2021-22, says US govt data New Delhi: The presence of Indian students in American universities has increased by 19% over the previous year, and nearly 21% of over one million foreign students are Indian students, according to a US government report.

item.title: DU admission 2022: More than 8,100 students allotted seats in second round
item.description: DU admission 2022: More than 8,100 students allotted seats in second round New Delhi: Over 8,100 new student applicants have been allotted seats in second round of college and programme allocation of Delhi University (DU), a DU registrar has informed PTI.
